One year later it carry five million cars from New York to New Jersey and back again
This week in Nineteen sixty two in a televised speech of extraordinary gravity president John F. Kennedy announces the U.S spy planes have discovered Soviet missile bases in Cuba
Kennedy announced that he was ordering an evil quarantine of Cuba to prevent Soviet shift for transporting any more offensive weapons to the island was known as the Cuban missile crisis potentially ended on October
